items.summary: Add the user-uploaded image file (WhatsApp-Image-2020-10-24-at-11.11.10-PM-2.jpeg) to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated as a properly sized login/sign-in logo image, and ensure it is the only image used on the login/sign-in screen.

Update the unauthenticated login/sign-in UI in frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.tsx to display the uploaded image (from frontend/public/assets/generated) in place of the current logo image, and update the alt text to a generic English description (do not use a personâ€™s name).
